FGO 3T Simulator v1.02

For all you three turn hyper farmers.

GitHub ReadMe

Servants Manager Quests Manager Battle Simulator

Please enter all stats the servant would have, including their CE stats and innate stats, and then click "Add Servant" to save them.
Hover over the for more details about certain fields, and use the README if you want further details.

Please select a class.
Please select a servant.

Valid NP damage multiplier required.
Valid NP Damage % up required.
Valid NP Gain Up percentage required.
Valid Buster effectiveness up required.
Valid Arts effectiveness up required.
Valid Quick effectiveness up required.
Valid Attack Up percentage required.
Valid Flat Attack up required.
Valid Power Mod required.

Enter all enemy stats and then click "Add Quest" to add this quest.
You can set an enemy's health to 0 if you wish to have then ignored in NP refund calculations.

Please also make sure you have servants in your party and a quest selected. This simulator will test NP damage on ALL enemies, with all debuffs applied on every enemy as well, regardless if servant NP is ST or AoE. NP refund will be calculated based on low-rolling NP damage, and enemies with 0 starting hp will be ignored in NP refund calculations.
